addressName: ZOOM through various breakout rooms. A form with specific directions on how this will work will be sent out after registration.

familyDiscount: Families sending more than one child pay $325 for two children and $425 for three children. Contact us here us if you are signing up more than 3 children.
scholarship: We offer need based scholarships for those who are unable to pay the registration fee. Please contact us if you require a need based scholarship.
